You wake in the dead of night, the warmth you once felt in the light is diminished, your protections are gone.

You find youself in great darkness, you scan the room arond you, but find nothing familiar. You try to move but find  yourself unable. As you struggle, a dark figure appears before you and a sinister laugh rings out, soon become deafening. You jolt upright, a faint voice still ringing in your ears.

You decide to have a magnificent set of armor forged for your horse. You bring your steed to the armory where its measurements are taken down.
You spend the day in front of the forge, hammer striking against iron as you try to fit armor to the horse.

You wait for hours, listening to the chorus of the armory as metal rhythmically clashes against metal. As the day fades, [mep_crafter.GetFirstName] appears before you. "My lord, the armor is finished"

You wait for hours, listening to the chaotic smashing of metal. As your frustration peaks, [mep_crafter.GetFirstName] finally presents [mep_crafter.GetHerHim]self "I couldn't manage the task. Apologies, the armor is mangled."

After many hours at the forge, your work is finished, as you look upon your work.

[mep_crafter.GetFirstName] appears to you, a humble bolt of cloth draped over the forged weapon. you pull away the drape to reveal the shimmering blade of Narsil. You take up the sword and inspect it, not a single marring to betray its history.

[mep_crafter.GetFirstName] appears to you, a sheathed blade in [mep_crafter.GetHerHis] hand. You pull the black blade from its hold, the light catches on the blade, its glint cast off once again as a pale flame.
[mep_crafter.GetFirstName] appears to you, the shards of Narsil spread upon a silver tray. "I have failed in my attempts, the blade still yet remains broken."

[mep_crafter.GetFirstName] appears to you, a sheathed blade in [mep_crafter.GetHerHis] hand. You pull the sword free only to see its shape still marred. "I could do nothing for it. It remains as it was."
Begone, I shall find a better smith.
Death alone can repay this failure.
